description: Teaches you how to ride the Mechanized Lumber Extractor. This is a flying mount.
name: Mechanized Lumber Extractor

spell.name: Mechanized Lumber Extractor
spell.description: Mount a Mechanized Lumber Extractor, allowing you to fly very fast. The claws are surprisingly delicate and herbalists can use them to pick herbs!  This is a flying mount.

requiredAbility.name: Expert Riding
requiredAbility.description: You can now learn to ride flying mounts from your riding trainer.
